casebody.data:
Jason Lindsey Smith and Shannon Friday Smith, Plaintiffs,
v.
US Bank National Association as Legal Title Trustee for Truman 2013 SC# Title Trust; Rushmore Loan Management Services, LLC; Bank of America, N.A.; BAC Home Loan Servicing, LP; and Cornish Law, PLLC as Substitute Trustee, Defendants. No. COA17-874 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: August 7, 2018

In the MATTER OF the Foreclosure of a Deed of Trust Executed by Jason Lindsey SMITH and Shannon Friday Smith Dated April 27, 2007 and Recorded in Book 4315 at Page 2450 in the Gaston County Public Registry, North Carolina.

DISMISSED.
